# 𒍂

𒍎 banšur bench, bed 𒍂 banšurₓ bench 𐌱𐌹𐌿𐌸𐍃 bʰeg.igi "table"
𒍎 𒌷𒍏 bar.urud board ≈ bord ≈ 𓉐 "bench" @ Irish ☑

𒍂 silig Schlick sludge "dough" לישא layšo mīkla permuted

𒍂 silig 𐍃𐍅𐌴𐌹𐌱𐌰𐌽 sweiban s'arrête smettere skončit спирам spiram "cease" causatives

𒂇𒍂 aga-silig "a type of ax" #agasalakku <> sickle ?

𒍂 𒅗 šilig;šilig₆ silig sehlig "mighty, majestic" 𓇳☉☀☼🌞

𒍂 silig₂ ≠ 𒋹 𒋵 silig₄ silig 𓂩 Schale "(cupped) hand"
